name: Party Cocktails
description:
The waiter is sad because he's about to be fired. He needs to get this cocktails party started by serving some drinks with style!


Your job is to move his tray, catch the elements falling from the sky and complete all orders! This waiter future is in your hands! Or fingers, to be more accurate.


Try to catch the balls as fast as possible, choosing a more passive strategy or going for some aggressive moves. It's your decision. Risk is part of the game, so don't be afraid of using your own strategy!


Features:
- Fun and original levels that will keep you entertained;
- Intuitive challenges that can be tricky sometimes;
- Wide diversity of movements: move left, right, up, down... Just don't stop!
- Creative content that will engage you in the game.
